org.virtualwar.board

Class Board

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.virtualwar.board.Board
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    TileBasedMap

    public class Board
extends java.lang.Object
implements TileBasedMap
    The Board class is the class for the actual board of game containing robots, obstacle and mines.
    Author:
    amberstar

      • generate

        public void generate(int pourcentageGen,
            boolean containsTank)
        Generate the whole grind.
        Parameters:
        pourcentageGen - the percentage of obstacles in the way
        containsTank - True will generate for tanks, False for other (tank can't go in diagonal)

      • getCost

        public float getCost(Mover mover,
            Coordinates cordsSource,
            Coordinates cordsTo)
        Description copied from interface: TileBasedMap
        Get the cost of moving through the given tile. This can be used to make certain areas more desirable. A simple and valid implementation of this method would be to return 1 in all cases.
        Specified by:
        getCost in interface TileBasedMap
        Parameters:
        mover - The mover that is trying to move across the tile
        cordsSource - The coordinate of the tile we're moving from
        cordsTo - The coordinate of the tile we're moving to
        Returns:
        The relative cost of moving across the given tile
